title: The Offseason Blues, Empowering Players, and New Coaches | GM Street (Ep. 237)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier discuss the similarities between Steve Kerr's and Bill Belichick's coaching philosophies (05:15), the key words in Frank Reich's press conference (11:00), Mike Shula becoming the Giants' offensive coordinator (28:00), and Charles Haley insulting the Dallas Cowboys (30:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
